name: Twitch Trials
description:
Twitch Trials is an interactive 3D platformer that can be controlled by you OR your Twitch audience! Navigate and race through a procedurally generated obstacle course set in a Candyland-esque world, and bring your Twitch chat along for the ride across three different game modes!

Features:

  • Easy integration with your Twitch stream, just type the verification code into your chat room when prompted!
  • Procedurally generated maps, allowing for near infinite course possibilities!
  •  Includes 15 unique courses across Streamer and Audience Modes, each with their own decorative and functional twist!

Game Modes:

  • Streamer Mode - Race through the obstacle course in a set time while your Twitch chat controls the course
  • Audience Mode - Give your Twitch chat full control over the player character and watch them struggle
  • Streamer VS Audience Mode - Pit yourself against your Twitch chat to see who can complete their course the fastest

Created as part of a semester project for my Master of Fine Arts degree over the course of ~7 months.

Requires a Twitch.tv account to play. Not sponsored nor endorsed by Twitch.tv.
